definition: at or in an indicated (usually distant) place (`yon' is archaic and dialectal), distant but within sight (`yon' is dialectal)
details:
adverb
- at or in an indicated (usually distant) place (`yon' is archaic and dialectal)
= example: at or in an indicated (usually distant) place (`yon' is archaic and dialectal)
adjective
- distant but within sight (`yon' is dialectal)
= example: distant but within sight (`yon' is dialectal)
= synonyms: yon
